name: Mysqltest
tagline: A first repo with python code for Github functionality evaluation
body:
# The MySQLTest github repository
## By David Pollard (david@pollardsetfilles.com)

This is a simple test project for a first repository in GitHub but
MySQL test is a real working python script that tests access
to NumPy, SciPy and a MySQL database

This project is unlikely to be useful to others.
The tests will not work unless the python libraries
NumPy and SciPy are available to the user. 
The MySQL test will not work either unless a specific
MySQL database and db_user with the right credentials
are available to the user.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
